content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5), boiler (position -25.5, 20.0), and offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5). The steam engine is intended to generate electricity using steam produced by the boiler, which requires a connection to a water source via the offshore pump.

### Copper plate mine at position(-18, -49)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position -18.0, -49.0) and a furnace (position -18.0, -49.0)

### Iron plate mine at position(5, -73)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 5.0, -73.0) and a furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of a lab (position -17.5, 23.5) which is used for research purposes.

### Copper cable factory at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) and inserter that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup that connects the furnace at position -18.0, -49.0 to the assembling machine at position -21.5, 25.5

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to boiler and steam engine connection
- Ensure that the boiler is connected to a suitable water source and that the pipes are correctly placed to allow for fluid transfer. Check for any blockages or disconnections in the pipe network.
- Verify that the boiler has fuel and is operational before attempting to connect it to the steam engine.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors related to power supply
- Confirm that all entities requiring power, such as the lab and assembling machine, are connected to a power network. Use small electric poles to extend power connections as needed.
